alert.note: Alert for Inland Worcester; Somerset (Maryland) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 27 at 1:42PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Somerset, southwestern Worcester and northern Accomack Counties through 230 PM EDT... At 141 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Pocomoke City. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Pocomoke City, Snow Hill, West Pocomoke, Westover, Horntown, Boxiron, Cokesbury, Goodwill, Greenbackville, Oak Hall, Beaver Dam, Atlantic, Girdletree, Stockton, Whitesburg and New Church. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
